Update Weekly Team Update Notes before Monday standup
Fill out Monthly IT Cap Report
Add public demo signups to weekly notes/standup prep
Work with Felix on portfolio team for public demo prioritization

key_context.summary: Bot sends weekly reminders for standup notes and monthly IT Cap reports. UEZ4PRFKM manages bot and jokes about competing with Nikita's manual reminders.
key_context.relevance: Shows operational cadence and team culture around documentation

key_context.summary: New Ventures tribe underwent reorganization with new squad names (Market Innovation & Optimization, Factor Form) replacing some previous squads. Channel was renamed to reflect new structure.
key_context.relevance: Major organizational change affecting team structure and responsibilities

key_context.summary: New process implemented for July reporting focused on 2025 Key Results with reduced overhead at tribe level, using Workday and specific spreadsheets as sources of truth.
key_context.relevance: Critical financial/resource tracking process with specific deadlines

key_context.summary: New process to track demo signups in weekly notes to improve prioritization and ensure live presentations rather than recordings, coordinating with portfolio team.
key_context.relevance: Improves external visibility and strategic presentation of team work

key_context.summary: Abdel planning to fix multiple charges issue in Q4/Q1, described as potentially really good news.

summary: New Ventures tribe coordination channel showing recurring operational cadence (weekly standup notes, monthly IT cap reports), recent squad restructuring, new capitalisation reporting process for July, and initiatives to improve public demo visibility and internal communication following leadership AMAs.
